author: admin
title: BEYOND20 Advisors to speak on Agile ITIL at FUSION 15
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 1:10 PM   Beyond20 
WASHINGTON, Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- BEYOND20 has been selected to present "Putting it all Together: Agile and ITIL" at service management conference FUSION 15, it announced today. FUSION 15, happening November 1 - 4 at the Hyatt Regency in New Orleans, will feature Erika Flora, Principal, and Andy Rivers, Senior Advisor, from BEYOND20 on Tuesday, November 3(rd). 
"Andy and I are excited to share our knowledge and discuss how ITSM can be combined with Agile methods to produce high-value IT services - and how you can have fun along the way," said Erika Flora, Principal at BEYOND20. "As part of the presentation, we will use Agile, project management, and ITSM/ITIL best practice in an interactive format by working through IT service-based projects. Plus, attendees will receive a complimentary copy of our book, 'Demystifying Agile, Scrum, and IT Service Management.'" 
Visit BEYOND20's website for a full list of upcoming speaking engagements. To see video on this and other Scrum and ITSM topics, visit BEYOND20's YouTube channel . 
ABOUT BEYOND20 Beyond20 is a technology-enabled services firm focused on transformative Project Management and IT Service Management solutions to support the practical implementation of Best Practice. Beyond20 is a Cherwell Preferred partner , with several of the world's largest and most complex Cherwell Service Management implementations to its credit. The company's experienced team has developed numerous customer solutions leveraging Cherwell's Codeless Business Application Platform, and was awarded "Most Innovative Use of Cherwell" at the 2014 Cherwell Global Conference. Additionally, the firm is a Microsoft PPM Gold Certified Partner, Bomgar Gold Partner, and Solarwinds Authorized Partner. All of the company's consultants and trainers are ITIL, Scrum, and ISO 20k certified and have extensive practical experience. Beyond20's clients include over 30% of the Fortune500, along with numerous Universities and Government Agencies. Follow @beyond20 or visit http://www.beyond20.com to learn more. 
ABOUT FUSION Jointly hosted by industry leaders HDI and itSMF USA, the annual FUSION Conference & Expo unites IT service management's best speakers, solution providers, and networking opportunities for an unparalleled educational experience. Each year, industry professionals, experts, and vendors attend to discover the best and newest technologies, ideas, systems, and methodologies. Looking for ways to improve their IT services, attendees gain valuable business contacts and tangible tools to immediately effect change within their organizations. Learn more at www.servicemanagementfusion.com .
